useForOf.description:
Description

Prefer usingfor...ofloops over standardforloops where possible.
This rule recommends using afor...ofloop in place of aforloop
when the loop index is solely used to read from the iterated array.
Exceptions for Index UsageSection titled “Exceptions for Index Usage”
When the loop index is declared within the outer scope or used anywhere within the loop body,
it is acceptable to use aforloop.
(Array.entries()can be used to a similar effect.)
useForOf.option: This rule has no specific options.
